nodes.text: The Ewoks Join the Fight  (short story)
"The Ewoks Join the Fight" is a short story published in 5-Minute Star Wars Stories. It adapts the film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
The story re-used illustrations previously done by Pilot Studio in the 2015 similarly named book Ewoks Join the Fight by Michael Siglain, with additional text written by Brooke Dworkin.
